 1461: %%
 1462: %% Testcase:
 1463: %%   monitor_nodes
 1464: %%
 1465: 
 1466: monitor_nodes_misc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1467:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_misc/2, Config).
 1468: 
 1469: monitor_nodes_misc(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1470:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1471:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
 1472:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type, all}, nodedown_reason]),
 1473:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [nodedown_reason, {node_type, all}, connection_id]),
 1474:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, #{node_type => all, nodedown_reason => true}),
 1475:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, #{node_type => all, nodedown_reason => true, connection_id => true}),
 1476:     Names = get_numbered_nodenames(3, node),
 1477:     [NN1, NN2, NN3] = Names,
 1478: 
 1479:     {ok, N1} = start_node(DCfg, NN1),
 1480:     {ok, N2} = start_node(DCfg, NN2, "-hidden"),
 1481: 
 1482:     receive {nodeup, N1} -> ok end,
 1483: 
 1484:     receive {nodeup, N1, #{node_type := visible}} -> ok end,
 1485:     receive {nodeup, N2, #{node_type := hidden}} -> ok end,
 1486:     receive {nodeup, N1, [{node_type, visible}]} -> ok end,
 1487:     receive {nodeup, N2, [{node_type, hidden}]} -> ok end,
 1488: 
 1489:     NodesInfo = erlang:nodes(connected, #{connection_id => true}),
 1490: 
 1491:     {N1, #{connection_id := N1CId}} = lists:keyfind(N1, 1, NodesInfo),
 1492:     {N2, #{connection_id := N2CId}} = lists:keyfind(N2, 1, NodesInfo),
 1493: 
 1494:     ct:pal("N1: ~p ~p~n", [N1, N1CId]),
 1495:     ct:pal("N2: ~p ~p~n", [N2, N2CId]),
 1496: 
 1497:     receive {nodeup, N1, #{node_type := visible, connection_id := N1CId}} -> ok end,
 1498:     receive {nodeup, N2, #{node_type := hidden, connection_id := N2CId}} -> ok end,
 1499: 
 1500:     N1UpInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, visible},{connection_id, N1CId}]),
 1501:     N2UpInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, hidden},{connection_id, N2CId}]),
 1502: 
 1503:     receive {nodeup, N1, UpN1Info} -> N1UpInfoSorted = lists:sort(UpN1Info) end,
 1504:     receive {nodeup, N2, UpN2Info} -> N2UpInfoSorted = lists:sort(UpN2Info) end,
 1505: 
 1506:     stop_node(N1),
 1507:     stop_node(N2),
 1508: 
 1509:     receive {nodedown, N1} -> ok end,
 1510: 
 1511:     receive {nodedown, N1, #{node_type := visible,
 1512:                              nodedown_reason := connection_closed}} -> ok end,
 1513:     receive {nodedown, N1, #{node_type := visible,
 1514:                              nodedown_reason := connection_closed,
 1515:                              connection_id := N1CId}} -> ok end,
 1516:     receive {nodedown, N2, #{node_type := hidden,
 1517:                              nodedown_reason := connection_closed}} -> ok end,
 1518:     receive {nodedown, N2, #{node_type := hidden,
 1519:                              nodedown_reason := connection_closed,
 1520:                              connection_id := N2CId}} -> ok end,
 1521: 
 1522:     N1ADownInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, visible},
 1523:                                     {nodedown_reason, connection_closed}]),
 1524:     N1BDownInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, visible},
 1525:                                     {nodedown_reason, connection_closed},
 1526:                                     {connection_id, N1CId}]),
 1527:     N2ADownInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, hidden},
 1528:                                     {nodedown_reason, connection_closed}]),
 1529:     N2BDownInfoSorted = lists:sort([{node_type, hidden},
 1530:                                     {nodedown_reason, connection_closed},
 1531:                                     {connection_id, N2CId}]),
 1532: 
 1533:     receive
 1534:         {nodedown, N1, N1Info1} ->
 1535:             case lists:sort(N1Info1) of
 1536:                 N1ADownInfoSorted ->
 1537:                     receive
 1538:                         {nodedown, N1, N1Info2} ->
 1539:                             N1BDownInfoSorted = lists:sort(N1Info2)
 1540:                     end;
 1541:                 N1BDownInfoSorted ->
 1542:                     receive
 1543:                         {nodedown, N1, N1Info2} ->
 1544:                             N1ADownInfoSorted = lists:sort(N1Info2)
 1545:                     end
 1546:             end
 1547:     end,
 1548:     receive
 1549:         {nodedown, N2, N2Info1} ->
 1550:             case lists:sort(N2Info1) of
 1551:                 N2ADownInfoSorted ->
 1552:                     receive
 1553:                         {nodedown, N2, N2Info2} ->
 1554:                             N2BDownInfoSorted = lists:sort(N2Info2)
 1555:                     end;
 1556:                 N2BDownInfoSorted ->
 1557:                     receive
 1558:                         {nodedown, N2, N2Info2} ->
 1559:                             N2ADownInfoSorted = lists:sort(N2Info2)
 1560:                     end
 1561:             end
 1562:     end,
 1563: 
 1564:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [{node_type, all}, nodedown_reason]),
 1565:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, [nodedown_reason, {node_type, all}, connection_id]),
 1566:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, #{node_type => all, nodedown_reason => true}),
 1567:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false, #{node_type => all, nodedown_reason => true, connection_id => true}),
 1568: 
 1569:     {ok, N3} = start_node(DCfg, NN3),
 1570:     receive {nodeup, N3} -> ok end,
 1571:     stop_node(N3),
 1572:     receive {nodedown, N3} -> ok end,
 1573:     print_my_messages(),
 1574:     ok = check_no_nodedown_nodeup(1000),
 1575:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1576:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1577:     ok.
 1578: 
 1579: 
 1580: %% Tests that {nodeup, Node} messages are received before
 1581: %% messages from Node and that {nodedown, Node} messages are
 1582: %% received after messages from Node.
 1583: monitor_nodes_otp_6481(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1584:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_otp_6481/2, Config).
 1585: 
 1586: monitor_nodes_otp_6481(DCfg, Config) ->
 1587:     io:format("Testing nodedown...~n"),
 1588:     monitor_nodes_otp_6481_test(DCfg, Config, nodedown),
 1589:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1590:     io:format("Testing nodeup...~n"),
 1591:     monitor_nodes_otp_6481_test(DCfg, Config, nodeup),
 1592:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1593:     ok = kill_existing_nodes(),
 1594:     ok.
 1595: 
 1596: -define(REPETITIONS, 10000).
 1597: 
 1598: kill_existing_nodes() ->
 1599:     kill_existing_nodes(nodes(), 0).
 1600: 
 1601: kill_existing_nodes([], _) ->
 1602:     ok;
 1603: kill_existing_nodes(_Nodes, ?REPETITIONS) ->
 1604:     exceeded_retries;
 1605: kill_existing_nodes(Nodes, Counter) ->
 1606:     ok = lists:foreach(fun(Node) -> stop_node(Node) end, Nodes),
 1607:     kill_existing_nodes(nodes(), Counter + 1).
 1608: 
 1609: monitor_nodes_otp_6481_test(DCfg, Config, TestType) when is_list(Config) ->
 1610:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1611:     NodeMsg = make_ref(),
 1612:     Me = self(),
 1613:     [Name] = get_nodenames(1, monitor_nodes_otp_6481),
 1614:     case TestType of
 1615: 	nodedown -> ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true);
 1616: 	nodeup -> ok
 1617:     end,
 1618:     Seq = lists:seq(1,?REPETITIONS),
 1619:     MN = spawn_link(
 1620: 	   fun () ->
 1621: 		   lists:foreach(
 1622: 		     fun (_) ->
 1623: 			     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true)
 1624: 		     end,
 1625: 		     Seq),
 1626: 		   Me ! {mon_set, self()},
 1627: 		   receive after infinity -> ok end
 1628: 	   end),
 1629:     receive {mon_set, MN} -> ok end,
 1630:     case TestType of
 1631: 	nodedown -> ok;
 1632: 	nodeup -> ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true)
 1633:     end,
 1634: 
 1635:     %% Whitebox:
 1636:     %% nodedown test: Since this process was the first one monitoring
 1637:     %%                nodes this process will be the first one notified
 1638:     %%                on nodedown.
 1639:     %% nodeup test:   Since this process was the last one monitoring
 1640:     %%                nodes this process will be the last one notified
 1641:     %%                on nodeup
 1642: 
 1643:     %% Verify the monitor_nodes order expected
 1644:     TestMonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1645:     %% io:format("~p~n", [TestMonNodeState]),
 1646:     TestMonNodeState =
 1647: 	case TestType of
 1648: 	    nodedown -> [];
 1649: 	    nodeup -> [{self(), []}]
 1650: 	end
 1651: 	++ lists:map(fun (_) -> {MN, []} end, Seq)
 1652: 	++ case TestType of
 1653: 	       nodedown -> [{self(), []}];
 1654: 	       nodeup -> []
 1655: 	   end
 1656: 	++ MonNodeState,
 1657: 
 1658:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, Name, "", this),
 1659:     receive {nodeup, Node} -> ok end,
 1660: 
 1661:     RemotePid = spawn(Node,
 1662: 		      fun () ->
 1663: 			      receive after 1500 -> ok end,
 1664: 			      %% infinite loop of msgs
 1665: 			      %% we want an endless stream of messages and the kill
 1666: 			      %% the node mercilessly.
 1667: 			      %% We then want to ensure that the nodedown message arrives
 1668: 			      %% last ... without garbage after it.
 1669: 			      _ = spawn(fun() -> node_loop_send(Me, NodeMsg, 1) end),
 1670: 			      receive {Me, kill_it} -> ok end,
 1671: 			      halt()
 1672: 		      end),
 1673: 
 1674:     net_kernel:disconnect(Node),
 1675:     receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok end,
 1676: 
 1677:     %% Verify that '{nodeup, Node}' comes before '{NodeMsg, 1}' (the message
 1678:     %% bringing up the connection).
 1679:     {nodeup, Node} = receive Msg1 -> Msg1 end,
 1680:     {NodeMsg, N}   = receive Msg2 -> Msg2 end,
 1681:     %% msg stream has begun, kill the node
 1682:     RemotePid ! {self(), kill_it},
 1683: 
 1684:     %% Verify that '{nodedown, Node}' comes after the last '{NodeMsg, N}'
 1685:     %% message.
 1686:     {nodedown, Node} = flush_node_msgs(NodeMsg, N+1),
 1687:     no_msgs(500),
 1688: 
 1689:     Mon = erlang:monitor(process, MN),
 1690:     unlink(MN),
 1691:     exit(MN, bang),
 1692:     receive {'DOWN', Mon, process, MN, bang} -> ok end,
 1693:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1694:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1695:     ok.
 1696: 
 1697: flush_node_msgs(NodeMsg, No) ->
 1698:     case receive Msg -> Msg end of
 1699: 	{NodeMsg, N} when N >= No ->
 1700: 	    flush_node_msgs(NodeMsg, N+1);
 1701: 	OtherMsg ->
 1702: 	    OtherMsg
 1703:     end.
 1704: 
 1705: node_loop_send(Pid, Msg, No) ->
 1706:     Pid ! {Msg, No},
 1707:     node_loop_send(Pid, Msg, No + 1).
 1708: 
 1709: monitor_nodes_errors(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1710:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1711:     error = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(asdf),
 1712:     {error,
 1713:      {unknown_options,
 1714:       [gurka]}} = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1715: 					   [gurka]),
 1716:     {error,
 1717:      {unknown_options,
 1718:       #{gurka := true}}} = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1719:                                                     #{gurka => true}),
 1720:     {error,
 1721:      {invalid_options,
 1722:       gurka}} = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1723: 					 gurka),
 1724:     {error,
 1725:      {option_value_mismatch,
 1726:       [{node_type,visible},
 1727:        {node_type,hidden}]}}
 1728: 	= net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1729: 				   [{node_type,hidden},
 1730: 				    {node_type,visible}]),
 1731:     {error,
 1732:      {option_value_mismatch,
 1733:       [{node_type,visible},
 1734:        {node_type,all}]}}
 1735: 	= net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true,
 1736: 				   [{node_type,all},
 1737: 				    {node_type,visible}]),
 1738:     {error,
 1739:      {bad_option_value,
 1740:       {node_type,
 1741:        blaha}}}
 1742: 	= net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, [{node_type, blaha}]),
 1743:     {error,
 1744:      {bad_option_value,
 1745:       #{node_type := blaha}}}
 1746: 	= net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true, #{node_type => blaha}),
 1747:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1748:     ok.
 1749: 
 1750: monitor_nodes_combinations(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1751:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_combinations/2, Config).
 1752: 
 1753: monitor_nodes_combinations(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1754:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1755:     monitor_nodes_all_comb(true),
 1756:     [VisibleName, HiddenName] = get_nodenames(2,
 1757: 					      monitor_nodes_combinations),
 1758:     {ok, Visible} = start_node(DCfg, VisibleName, ""),
 1759:     receive_all_comb_nodeup_msgs(visible, Visible),
 1760:     no_msgs(),
 1761:     stop_node(Visible),
 1762:     receive_all_comb_nodedown_msgs(visible, Visible, connection_closed),
 1763:     no_msgs(),
 1764:     {ok, Hidden} = start_node(DCfg, HiddenName, "-hidden"),
 1765:     receive_all_comb_nodeup_msgs(hidden, Hidden),
 1766:     no_msgs(),
 1767:     stop_node(Hidden),
 1768:     receive_all_comb_nodedown_msgs(hidden, Hidden, connection_closed),
 1769:     no_msgs(),
 1770:     monitor_nodes_all_comb(false),
 1771:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1772:     no_msgs(),
 1773:     ok.
 1774: 
 1775: monitor_nodes_all_comb(Flag) ->
 1776:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag),
 1777:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1778: 				  [nodedown_reason]),
 1779:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1780: 				  [{node_type, hidden}]),
 1781:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1782: 				  [{node_type, visible}]),
 1783:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1784: 				  [{node_type, all}]),
 1785:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1786: 				  [nodedown_reason,
 1787: 				   {node_type, hidden}]),
 1788:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1789: 				  [nodedown_reason,
 1790: 				   {node_type, visible}]),
 1791:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(Flag,
 1792: 				  [nodedown_reason,
 1793: 				   {node_type, all}]),
 1794:     %% There currently are 8 different combinations
 1795:     8.
 1796: 
 1797: 
 1798: receive_all_comb_nodeup_msgs(visible, Node) ->
 1799:     io:format("Receive nodeup visible...~n"),
 1800:     Exp = [{nodeup, Node},
 1801: 	   {nodeup, Node, []}]
 1802: 	++ mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodeup_msgs_common(visible, Node),
 1803:     receive_mn_msgs(Exp),
 1804:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1805:     ok;
 1806: receive_all_comb_nodeup_msgs(hidden, Node) ->
 1807:     io:format("Receive nodeup hidden...~n"),
 1808:     Exp = mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodeup_msgs_common(hidden, Node),
 1809:     receive_mn_msgs(Exp),
 1810:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1811:     ok.
 1812: 
 1813: mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodeup_msgs_common(Type, Node) ->
 1814:     InfoNt = [{node_type, Type}],
 1815:     [{nodeup, Node, InfoNt},
 1816:      {nodeup, Node, InfoNt},
 1817:      {nodeup, Node, InfoNt},
 1818:      {nodeup, Node, InfoNt}].
 1819: 
 1820: receive_all_comb_nodedown_msgs(visible, Node, Reason) ->
 1821:     io:format("Receive nodedown visible...~n"),
 1822:     Exp = [{nodedown, Node},
 1823: 	   {nodedown, Node, [{nodedown_reason, Reason}]}]
 1824: 	++ mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodedown_msgs_common(visible,
 1825: 						   Node,
 1826: 						   Reason),
 1827:     receive_mn_msgs(Exp),
 1828:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1829:     ok;
 1830: receive_all_comb_nodedown_msgs(hidden, Node, Reason) ->
 1831:     io:format("Receive nodedown hidden...~n"),
 1832:     Exp = mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodedown_msgs_common(hidden, Node, Reason),
 1833:     receive_mn_msgs(Exp),
 1834:     io:format("ok~n"),
 1835:     ok.
 1836: 
 1837: mk_exp_mn_all_comb_nodedown_msgs_common(Type, Node, Reason) ->
 1838:     InfoNt = [{node_type, Type}],
 1839:     InfoNdrNt = lists:sort([{nodedown_reason, Reason}]++InfoNt),
 1840:     [{nodedown, Node, InfoNt},
 1841:      {nodedown, Node, InfoNt},
 1842:      {nodedown, Node, InfoNdrNt},
 1843:      {nodedown, Node, InfoNdrNt}].
 1844: 
 1845: receive_mn_msgs([]) ->
 1846:     ok;
 1847: receive_mn_msgs(Msgs) ->
 1848:     io:format("Expecting msgs: ~p~n", [Msgs]),
 1849:     receive
 1850: 	{_Dir, _Node} = Msg ->
 1851: 	    io:format("received ~p~n", [Msg]),
 1852: 	    case lists:member(Msg, Msgs) of
 1853: 		true -> receive_mn_msgs(lists:delete(Msg, Msgs));
 1854: 		false -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg,
 1855: 				  expected_messages, Msgs})
 1856: 	    end;
 1857: 	{Dir, Node, Info} ->
 1858: 	    Msg = {Dir, Node, lists:sort(Info)},
 1859: 	    io:format("received ~p~n", [Msg]),
 1860: 	    case lists:member(Msg, Msgs) of
 1861: 		true -> receive_mn_msgs(lists:delete(Msg, Msgs));
 1862: 		false -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg,
 1863: 				  expected_messages, Msgs})
 1864: 	    end;
 1865: 	Msg ->
 1866: 	    io:format("received ~p~n", [Msg]),
 1867: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_message, Msg,
 1868: 		     expected_messages, Msgs})
 1869:     end.
 1870: 
 1871: monitor_nodes_cleanup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1872:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1873:     Me = self(),
 1874:     No = monitor_nodes_all_comb(true),
 1875:     Inf = spawn(fun () ->
 1876: 			monitor_nodes_all_comb(true),
 1877: 			Me ! {mons_set, self()},
 1878: 			receive after infinity -> ok end
 1879: 		end),
 1880:     TO = spawn(fun () ->
 1881: 		       monitor_nodes_all_comb(true),
 1882: 		       Me ! {mons_set, self()},
 1883: 		       receive after 500 -> ok end
 1884: 	       end),
 1885:     receive {mons_set, Inf} -> ok end,
 1886:     receive {mons_set, TO} -> ok end,
 1887:     MNLen = length(MonNodeState) + No*3,
 1888:     MNLen = length(monitor_node_state()),
 1889:     MonInf = erlang:monitor(process, Inf),
 1890:     MonTO = erlang:monitor(process, TO),
 1891:     exit(Inf, bang),
 1892:     No = monitor_nodes_all_comb(false),
 1893:     receive {'DOWN', MonInf, process, Inf, bang} -> ok end,
 1894:     receive {'DOWN', MonTO, process, TO, normal} -> ok end,
 1895:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1896:     no_msgs(),
 1897:     ok.
 1898: 
 1899: monitor_nodes_many(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1900:     run_dist_configs(fun monitor_nodes_many/2, Config).
 1901: 
 1902: monitor_nodes_many(DCfg, _Config) ->
 1903:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1904:     [Name] = get_nodenames(1, monitor_nodes_many),
 1905:     %% We want to perform more than 2^16 net_kernel:monitor_nodes
 1906:     %% since this will wrap an internal counter
 1907:     No = (1 bsl 16) + 17,
 1908:     repeat(fun () -> ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true) end, No),
 1909:     No = length(monitor_node_state()) - length(MonNodeState),
 1910:     {ok, Node} = start_node(DCfg, Name),
 1911:     repeat(fun () -> receive {nodeup, Node} -> ok end end, No),
 1912:     stop_node(Node),
 1913:     repeat(fun () -> receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok end end, No),
 1914:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1915:     no_msgs(10),
 1916:     MonNodeState = monitor_node_state(),
 1917:     ok.
 1918: 
 1919: %% Test order of messages nodedown and nodeup.
 1920: monitor_nodes_down_up(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1921:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 1922:     true = net_kernel:connect_node(Node),
 1923:     monitor_nodes_yoyo(Node),
 1924:     peer:stop(Peer).
 1925: 
 1926: monitor_nodes_yoyo(A) ->
 1927:     net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
 1928:     Papa = self(),
 1929: 
 1930:     %% Spawn lots of processes doing one erlang:monitor_node(A,true) each
 1931:     %% just to get lots of other monitors to fire when connection goes down
 1932:     %% and thereby give time for {nodeup,A} to race before {nodedown,A}.
 1933:     NodeMonCnt = 10000,
 1934:     NodeMons = [my_spawn_opt(fun F() ->
 1935:                                      monitor_node = receive_any(),
 1936:                                      monitor_node(A, true),
 1937:                                      Papa ! ready,
 1938:                                      {nodedown, A} =  receive_any(),
 1939:                                      F()
 1940:                              end,
 1941:                              [link, monitor, {priority, low}])
 1942:                 ||
 1943:                    _ <- lists:seq(1, NodeMonCnt)],
 1944: 
 1945:     %% Spawn message spamming process to trigger new connection setups
 1946:     %% as quick as possible.
 1947:     Spammer = my_spawn_opt(fun F() ->
 1948:                                    {dummy, A} ! trigger_auto_connect,
 1949:                                    F()
 1950:                            end,
 1951:                            [link, monitor]),
 1952: 
 1953:     %% Now bring connection down and verify we get {nodedown,A} before {nodeup,A}.
 1954:     Yoyos = 20,
 1955:     [begin
 1956:          [P ! monitor_node || P <- NodeMons],
 1957:          [receive ready -> ok end || _ <- NodeMons],
 1958: 
 1959:          Owner = get_conn_owner(A),
 1960:          exit(Owner, kill),
 1961: 
 1962:          {nodedown, A} = receive_any(),
 1963:          {nodeup, A} = receive_any()
 1964:      end
 1965:      || _ <- lists:seq(1,Yoyos)],
 1966: 
 1967:     unlink(Spammer),
 1968:     exit(Spammer, die),
 1969:     receive {'DOWN',_,process,Spammer,_} -> ok end,
 1970: 
 1971:     [begin unlink(P), exit(P, die) end || P <- NodeMons],
 1972:     [receive {'DOWN',_,process,P,_} -> ok end || P <- NodeMons],
 1973: 
 1974:     net_kernel:monitor_nodes(false),
 1975:     ok.
 1976: 
 1977: receive_any() ->
 1978:     receive_any(infinity).
 1979: 
 1980: receive_any(Timeout) ->
 1981:     receive
 1982:         M -> M
 1983:     after
 1984:         Timeout -> timeout
 1985:     end.
 1986: 
 1987: my_spawn_opt(Fun, Opts) ->
 1988:     case spawn_opt(Fun, Opts) of
 1989:         {Pid, _Mref} -> Pid;
 1990:         Pid -> Pid
 1991:     end.
 1992: 
 1993: get_conn_owner(Node) ->
 1994:     {ok, NodeInfo} = net_kernel:node_info(Node),
 1995:     {value,{owner, Owner}} = lists:keysearch(owner, 1, NodeInfo),
 1996:     Owner.
 1997: 
 1998: dist_ctrl_proc_smoke(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1999:     dist_ctrl_proc_test(get_nodenames(2, ?FUNCTION_NAME)).
 2000: 
 2001: dist_ctrl_proc_reject(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2002:     ToReject = combinations(dist_util:rejectable_flags()),
 2003:     lists:map(fun(Flags) ->
 2004:                       ct:log("Try to reject ~p",[Flags]),
 2005:                       dist_ctrl_proc_test(get_nodenames(2, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2006:                         "-gen_tcp_dist_reject_flags " ++ integer_to_list(Flags))
 2007:               end, ToReject).
 2008: 
 2009: combinations([H | T]) ->
 2010:     lists:flatten([[(1 bsl H) bor C || C <- combinations(T)] | combinations(T)]);
 2011: combinations([]) ->
 2012:     [0];
 2013: combinations(BitField) ->
 2014:     lists:sort(combinations(bits(BitField, 0))).
 2015: 
 2016: bits(0, _) ->
 2017:     [];
 2018: bits(BitField, Cnt) when BitField band 1 == 1 ->
 2019:     [Cnt | bits(BitField bsr 1, Cnt + 1)];
 2020: bits(BitField, Cnt) ->
 2021:     bits(BitField bsr 1, Cnt + 1).
 2022: 
 2023: dist_ctrl_proc_test(Nodes) ->
 2024:     dist_ctrl_proc_test(Nodes,"").
 2025: 
 2026: dist_ctrl_proc_test([Name1,Name2], Extra) ->
 2027:     ThisNode = node(),
 2028:     GenTcpOptProlog = "-proto_dist gen_tcp "
 2029:         "-gen_tcp_dist_output_loop " ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ " " ++
 2030:         "dist_cntrlr_output_test_size " ++ Extra,
 2031:     {ok, Node1} = start_node("", Name1, "-proto_dist gen_tcp"),
 2032:     {ok, Node2} = start_node("", Name2, GenTcpOptProlog),
 2033:     NL = lists:sort([ThisNode, Node1, Node2]),
 2034:     wait_until(fun () ->
 2035:                        NL == lists:sort([node()|nodes()])
 2036:                end),
 2037:     wait_until(fun () ->
 2038:                        NL == lists:sort([rpc:call(Node1,erlang, node, [])
 2039:                                          | rpc:call(Node1, erlang, nodes, [])])
 2040:                end),
 2041:     wait_until(fun () ->
 2042:                        NL == lists:sort([rpc:call(Node2,erlang, node, [])
 2043:                                          | rpc:call(Node2, erlang, nodes, [])])
 2044:                end),
 2045: 
 2046:     smoke_communicate(Node1, gen_tcp_dist, dist_cntrlr_output_loop),
 2047:     smoke_communicate(Node2, erl_distribution_SUITE, dist_cntrlr_output_loop_size),
 2048: 
 2049:     stop_node(Node1),
 2050:     stop_node(Node2),
 2051:     ok.
 2052: 
 2053: smoke_communicate(Node, OLoopMod, OLoopFun) ->
 2054:     %% Verify that we actually are executing the distribution
 2055:     %% module we expect and also massage message passing over
 2056:     %% the connection a bit...
 2057:     Ps = rpc:call(Node, erlang, processes, []),
 2058:     try
 2059:         lists:foreach(
 2060:           fun (P) ->
 2061:                   case rpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [P, current_stacktrace]) of
 2062:                       undefined ->
 2063:                           ok;
 2064:                       {current_stacktrace, StkTrace} ->
 2065:                           lists:foreach(fun ({Mod, Fun, 2, _}) when Mod == OLoopMod,
 2066:                                                                     Fun == OLoopFun ->
 2067:                                                 io:format("~p ~p~n", [P, StkTrace]),
 2068:                                                 throw(found_it);
 2069:                                             (_) ->
 2070:                                                 ok
 2071:                                         end, StkTrace)
 2072:                   end
 2073:           end, Ps),
 2074:         exit({missing, {OLoopMod, OLoopFun}})
 2075:     catch
 2076:         throw:found_it -> ok
 2077:     end,
 2078:     Bin = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(1000,100)),
 2079:     BitStr = <<0:7999>>,
 2080:     List = [[Bin], atom, [BitStr|Bin], make_ref(), [[[BitStr|"hopp"]]],
 2081:             4711, 111122222211111111111111,"hej", fun () -> ok end, BitStr,
 2082:             self(), fun erlang:node/1],
 2083:     Pid = spawn_link(Node, fun () -> receive {From1, Msg1} -> From1 ! Msg1 end,
 2084:                                      receive {From2, Msg2} -> From2 ! Msg2 end
 2085:                            end),
 2086:     R = make_ref(),
 2087:     Pid ! {self(), [R, List]},
 2088:     receive [R, L1] -> List = L1 end,
 2089: 
 2090:     %% Send a huge message in order to trigger message fragmentation if enabled
 2091:     FragBin = <<0:(2*(1024*64*8))>>,
 2092:     Pid ! {self(), [R, List, FragBin]},
 2093:     receive [R, L2, B] -> List = L2, FragBin = B end,
 2094: 
 2095:     unlink(Pid),
 2096:     exit(Pid, kill),
 2097:     ok.
 2098: 
 2099: 
 2100: erl_uds_dist_smoke_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2101:     case os:type() of
 2102:         {win32,_} ->
 2103:             {skipped, "Not on Windows"};
 2104:         _ ->
 2105:             do_erl_uds_dist_smoke_test()
 2106:     end.
 2107: 
 2108: do_erl_uds_dist_smoke_test() ->
 2109:     [Node1, Node2] = lists:map(fun (Name) ->
 2110:                                        list_to_atom(atom_to_list(Name) ++ "@localhost")
 2111:                                end,
 2112:                                get_nodenames(2, erl_uds_dist_smoke_test)),
 2113:     {LPort, Acceptor} = uds_listen(),
 2114:     start_uds_node(Node1, LPort),
 2115:     start_uds_node(Node2, LPort),
 2116:     receive
 2117:         {uds_nodeup, N1} ->
 2118:             io:format("~p is up~n", [N1])
 2119:     end,
 2120:     receive
 2121:         {uds_nodeup, N2} ->
 2122:             io:format("~p is up~n", [N2])
 2123:     end,
 2124:     
 2125:     io:format("Testing ping net_adm:ping(~p) on ~p~n", [Node2, Node1]),
 2126:     Node1 ! {self(), {net_adm, ping, [Node2]}},
 2127:     receive
 2128:         {Node1, PingRes} ->
 2129:             io:format("~p~n", [PingRes]),
 2130:             pong = PingRes
 2131:     end,
 2132: 
 2133:     io:format("Testing nodes() on ~p~n", [Node1]),
 2134:     Node1 ! {self(), {erlang, nodes, []}},
 2135:     receive
 2136:         {Node1, N1List} ->
 2137:             io:format("~p~n", [N1List]),
 2138:             [Node2] = N1List
 2139:     end,
 2140: 
 2141:     io:format("Testing nodes() on ~p~n", [Node2]),
 2142:     Node2 ! {self(), {erlang, nodes, []}},
 2143:     receive
 2144:         {Node2, N2List} ->
 2145:             io:format("~p~n", [N2List]),
 2146:             [Node1] = N2List
 2147:     end,
 2148: 
 2149:     io:format("Shutting down~n", []),
 2150: 
 2151:     Node1 ! {self(), close},
 2152:     Node2 ! {self(), close},
 2153: 
 2154:     receive {Node1, C1} -> ok = C1 end,
 2155:     receive {Node2, C2} -> ok = C2 end,
 2156: 
 2157:     unlink(Acceptor),
 2158:     exit(Acceptor, kill),
 2159: 
 2160:     io:format("ok~n", []),
 2161: 
 2162:     ok.
 2163: 
 2164: %% Helpers for testing the erl_uds_dist example
 2165: 
 2166: uds_listen() ->
 2167:     Me = self(),
 2168:     {ok, LSock} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [binary, {packet, 4}, {active, false}]),
 2169:     {ok, LPort} = inet:port(LSock),
 2170:     {LPort, spawn_link(fun () ->
 2171:                                uds_accept_loop(LSock, Me)
 2172:                        end)}.
 2173: 
 2174: uds_accept_loop(LSock, TestProc) ->
 2175:     {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:accept(LSock),
 2176:     _ = spawn_link(fun () ->
 2177:                            uds_rpc_client_init(Sock, TestProc)
 2178:                    end),
 2179:     uds_accept_loop(LSock, TestProc).
 2180: 
 2181: uds_rpc(Sock, MFA) ->
 2182:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, term_to_binary(MFA)),
 2183:     case gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0) of
 2184:         {error, Reason} ->
 2185:             error({recv_failed, Reason});
 2186:         {ok, Packet} ->
 2187:             binary_to_term(Packet)
 2188:     end.
 2189: 
 2190: uds_rpc_client_init(Sock, TestProc) ->
 2191:     case uds_rpc(Sock, {erlang, node, []}) of
 2192:         nonode@nohost ->
 2193:             %% Wait for distribution to come up...
 2194:             receive after 100 -> ok end,
 2195:             uds_rpc_client_init(Sock, TestProc);
 2196:         Node when is_atom(Node) ->
 2197:             register(Node, self()),
 2198:             TestProc ! {uds_nodeup, Node},
 2199:             uds_rpc_client_loop(Sock, Node)
 2200:     end.
 2201: 
 2202: uds_rpc_client_loop(Sock, Node) ->
 2203:     receive
 2204:         {From, close} ->
 2205:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, term_to_binary(close)),
 2206:             From ! {Node, gen_tcp:close(Sock)},
 2207:             exit(normal);
 2208:         {From, ApplyData} ->
 2209:             From ! {Node, uds_rpc(Sock, ApplyData)},
 2210:             uds_rpc_client_loop(Sock, Node)
 2211:     end.
 2212: 
 2213: uds_rpc_server_loop(Sock) ->
 2214:     case gen_tcp:recv(Sock, 0) of
 2215:         {error, Reason} ->
 2216:             error({recv_failed, Reason});
 2217:         {ok, Packet} ->
 2218:             case binary_to_term(Packet) of
 2219:                 {M, F, A} when is_atom(M), is_atom(F), is_list(A) ->
 2220:                     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, term_to_binary(apply(M, F, A)));
 2221:                 {F, A} when is_function(F), is_list(A) ->
 2222:                     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, term_to_binary(apply(F, A)));
 2223:                 close ->
 2224:                     ok = gen_tcp:close(Sock),
 2225:                     exit(normal);
 2226:                 Other ->
 2227:                     error({unexpected_data, Other})
 2228:             end
 2229:     end,
 2230:     uds_rpc_server_loop(Sock).
 2231: 
 2232: start_uds_rpc_server([PortString]) ->
 2233:     Port = list_to_integer(PortString),
 2234:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 2235:                                        {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:connect({127,0,0,1}, Port,
 2236:                                                                     [binary, {packet, 4},
 2237:                                                                      {active, false}]),
 2238:                                        uds_rpc_server_loop(Sock)
 2239:                                end),
 2240:     receive
 2241:         {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, Reason} ->
 2242:             if Reason == normal ->
 2243:                     halt();
 2244:                true ->
 2245:                     EStr = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("uds rpc server crashed: ~p", [Reason])),
 2246:                     (catch file:write_file("uds_rpc_server_crash."++os:getpid(), EStr)),
 2247:                     halt(EStr)
 2248:             end
 2249:     end.
 2250: 
 2251: start_uds_node(NodeName, LPort) ->
 2252:     Static = "-detached -noinput -proto_dist erl_uds",
 2253:     Pa = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 2254:     Prog = case catch init:get_argument(progname) of
 2255: 	       {ok,[[P]]} -> P;
 2256: 	       _ -> error(no_progname_argument_found)
 2257: 	   end,
 2258:     {ok, Pwd} = file:get_cwd(),
 2259:     NameStr = atom_to_list(NodeName),
 2260:     CmdLine = Prog ++ " "
 2261: 	++ Static
 2262: 	++ " -sname " ++ NameStr
 2263: 	++ " -pa " ++ Pa
 2264: 	++ " -env ERL_CRASH_DUMP " ++ Pwd ++ "/erl_crash_dump." ++ NameStr
 2265: 	++ " -setcookie " ++ atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie())
 2266:         ++ " -run " ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ " start_uds_rpc_server "
 2267:         ++ integer_to_list(LPort),
 2268:     io:format("Starting: ~p~n", [CmdLine]),
 2269:     case open_port({spawn, CmdLine}, []) of
 2270: 	Port when is_port(Port) ->
 2271: 	    unlink(Port),
 2272: 	    erlang:port_close(Port);
 2273: 	Error ->
 2274: 	    error({open_port_failed, Error})
 2275:     end,
 2276:     ok.
 2277: 
 2278: erl_1424(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2279:     {error, Reason} = erl_epmd:names("."),
 2280:     {comment, lists:flatten(io_lib:format("Reason: ~p", [Reason]))}.
 2281: 
 2282: net_kernel_start(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2283:     MyName = net_kernel_start_tester,
 2284:     register(MyName, self()),
 2285:     net_kernel_start_test(MyName, 120, 8, true, false),
 2286:     net_kernel_start_test(MyName, 120, 8, false, false),
 2287:     net_kernel_start_test(MyName, 120, 8, true, true),
 2288:     net_kernel_start_test(MyName, undefined, undefined, undefined, undefined).
 2289: 
 2290: net_kernel_start_test(MyName, NetTickTime, NetTickIntesity, DistListen, Hidden) ->
 2291:     TestNameStr = "net_kernel_start_test_node-"
 2292:         ++ integer_to_list(erlang:system_time(seconds))
 2293:         ++ "-" ++ integer_to_list(erlang:unique_integer([monotonic,positive])),
 2294:     TestNode = list_to_atom(TestNameStr ++ "@" ++ atom_to_list(gethostname())),
 2295:     CmdLine = net_kernel_start_cmdline(MyName, list_to_atom(TestNameStr),
 2296:                                        NetTickTime, NetTickIntesity, DistListen, Hidden),
 2297:     io:format("Starting test node ~p: ~s~n", [TestNode, CmdLine]),
 2298:     case open_port({spawn, CmdLine}, []) of
 2299: 	Port when is_port(Port) ->
 2300:             case DistListen == false of
 2301:                 false ->
 2302:                     ok;
 2303:                 true ->
 2304:                     receive after 1500 -> ok end,
 2305:                     pang = net_adm:ping(TestNode),
 2306:                     ok
 2307:             end,
 2308:             receive
 2309:                 {i_am_alive, Pid, Node, NTT} = Msg ->
 2310:                     IsHidden = lists:member(TestNode, nodes(hidden)),
 2311:                     IsVisible = lists:member(TestNode, nodes(visible)),
 2312:                     io:format("IsVisible = ~p~nIsHidden = ~p~n", [IsVisible, IsHidden]),
 2313:                     io:format("Response from ~p: ~p~n", [Node, Msg]),
 2314:                     rpc:cast(Node, erlang, halt, []),
 2315:                     catch erlang:port_close(Port),
 2316:                     TestNode = node(Pid),
 2317:                     TestNode = Node,
 2318:                     case NetTickTime == undefined of
 2319:                         true ->
 2320:                             {ok, DefNTT} = application:get_env(kernel, net_ticktime),
 2321:                             DefNTT = NTT;
 2322:                         false ->
 2323:                             NetTickTime = NTT
 2324:                     end,
 2325:                     case DistListen == false orelse Hidden == true of
 2326:                         true ->
 2327:                             true = IsHidden,
 2328:                             false = IsVisible;
 2329:                         false ->
 2330:                             false = IsHidden,
 2331:                             true = IsVisible
 2332:                     end
 2333:             end,
 2334:             ok;
 2335: 	Error ->
 2336: 	    error({open_port_failed, TestNode, Error})
 2337:     end.
 2338: 
 2339: net_kernel_start_cmdline(TestName, Name, NetTickTime, NetTickIntensity, DistListen, Hidden) ->
 2340:     Pa = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 2341:     Prog = case catch init:get_argument(progname) of
 2342: 	       {ok, [[Prg]]} -> Prg;
 2343: 	       _ -> error(missing_progname)
 2344: 	   end,
 2345:     NameDomain = case net_kernel:longnames() of
 2346:                      false -> "shortnames";
 2347:                      true -> "longnames"
 2348:                  end,
 2349:     {ok, Pwd} = file:get_cwd(),
 2350:     NameStr = atom_to_list(Name),
 2351:     Prog ++ " -noinput -noshell -detached -pa " ++ Pa
 2352: 	++ " -env ERL_CRASH_DUMP " ++ Pwd ++ "/erl_crash_dump." ++ NameStr
 2353: 	++ " -setcookie " ++ atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie())
 2354: 	++ " -run " ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ " net_kernel_start_do_test "
 2355: 	++ atom_to_list(TestName) ++ " " ++ atom_to_list(node()) ++ " "
 2356:         ++ NameStr ++ " " ++ NameDomain
 2357:         ++ case NetTickTime == undefined of
 2358:                true ->
 2359:                    "";
 2360:                false ->
 2361:                    " " ++ integer_to_list(NetTickTime) ++
 2362:                        " " ++ integer_to_list(NetTickIntensity)
 2363:            end
 2364:         ++ case DistListen == undefined of
 2365:                true -> "";
 2366:                false -> " " ++ atom_to_list(DistListen)
 2367:            end
 2368:         ++ case Hidden == undefined of
 2369:                true -> "";
 2370:                false -> " " ++ atom_to_list(Hidden)
 2371:            end.
 2372: 
 2373: net_kernel_start_do_test([TestName, TestNode, Name, NameDomain]) ->
 2374:     net_kernel_start_do_test(TestName, TestNode, list_to_atom(Name),
 2375:                              #{name_domain => list_to_atom(NameDomain)});
 2376: 
 2377: net_kernel_start_do_test([TestName, TestNode, Name, NameDomain, NetTickTime, NetTickIntensity,
 2378:                           DistListen, Hidden]) ->
 2379:     net_kernel_start_do_test(TestName, TestNode, list_to_atom(Name),
 2380:                              #{net_ticktime => list_to_integer(NetTickTime),
 2381:                                name_domain => list_to_atom(NameDomain),
 2382:                                net_tickintensity => list_to_integer(NetTickIntensity),
 2383:                                dist_listen => list_to_atom(DistListen),
 2384:                                hidden => list_to_atom(Hidden)}).
 2385: 
 2386: net_kernel_start_do_test(TestName, TestNode, Name, Options) ->
 2387:     case net_kernel:start(Name, Options) of
 2388:         {ok, _Pid} ->
 2389:             case maps:get(dist_listen, Options, true) of
 2390:                 false -> receive after 3000 -> ok end;
 2391:                 true -> ok
 2392:             end,
 2393:             Tester = {list_to_atom(TestName), list_to_atom(TestNode)},
 2394:             Tester ! {i_am_alive, self(), node(), net_kernel:get_net_ticktime()},
 2395:             receive after 60000 -> ok end,
 2396:             erlang:halt();
 2397:         Error ->
 2398:             erlang:halt(lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~p", [Error])))
 2399:     end.
 2400: 
 2401: differing_cookies(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2402:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2403:     Node = node(),
 2404:     true = Node =/= nonode@nohost,
 2405:     [] = nodes(),
 2406:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2407: 
 2408:     %% Use -hidden nodes to avoid global connecting all nodes
 2409: 
 2410:     %% Start node A with different cookie
 2411:     NodeAName = BaseName++"_nodeA",
 2412:     NodeA = full_node_name(NodeAName),
 2413:     NodeACookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2414:     NodeACookie = list_to_atom(NodeACookieL),
 2415:     true = erlang:set_cookie( NodeA, NodeACookie ),
 2416:     { ok, NodeA } =
 2417:         start_node( "-hidden", NodeAName, "-setcookie "++NodeACookieL ),
 2418:     try
 2419: 
 2420:         %% Verify the cluster
 2421:         [ NodeA ] = nodes(hidden),
 2422:         [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2423: 
 2424:         %% Start node B with another different cookie
 2425:         NodeBName = BaseName++"_nodeB",
 2426:         NodeB = full_node_name(NodeBName),
 2427:         NodeBCookieL = BaseName++"_cookieB",
 2428:         NodeBCookie = list_to_atom(NodeBCookieL),
 2429:         true = erlang:set_cookie( NodeB, NodeBCookie ),
 2430:         { ok, NodeB } =
 2431:             start_node( "-hidden", NodeBName, "-setcookie "++NodeBCookieL ),
 2432:         try
 2433: 
 2434:             %% Verify the cluster
 2435:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2436:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2437:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2438: 
 2439:             %% Verify that the nodes can not connect
 2440:             %% before correcting the cookie configuration
 2441:             pang = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2442:             pang = rpc:call( NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA] ),
 2443: 
 2444:             %% Configure cookie and connect node A -> B
 2445:             true = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, set_cookie, [NodeB, NodeBCookie] ),
 2446:             pong = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2447: 
 2448:             %% Verify the cluster
 2449:             NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2450:             NodeBCookie = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2451:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2452:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeB],
 2453:                         rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2454:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeA],
 2455:                         rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2456: 
 2457:             %% Disconnect node A from B
 2458:             true = rpc:call( NodeB, net_kernel, disconnect, [NodeA] ),
 2459: 
 2460:             %% Verify the cluster
 2461:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2462:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2463:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2464: 
 2465:             %% Reconnect, now node B -> A
 2466:             pong = rpc:call( NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA] ),
 2467: 
 2468:             %% Verify the cluster
 2469:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2470:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeB],
 2471:                         rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2472:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeA],
 2473:                         rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ))
 2474: 
 2475:         after
 2476:             _ = stop_node(NodeB)
 2477:         end
 2478:     after
 2479:         _ = stop_node(NodeA)
 2480:     end,
 2481:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2482:     ok.
 2483: 
 2484: cmdline_setcookie_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2485:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2486:     Node = node(),
 2487:     true = Node =/= nonode@nohost,
 2488:     [] = nodes(),
 2489:     NodeL = atom_to_list(Node),
 2490:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2491:     NodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie(),
 2492:     NodeCookieL = atom_to_list(NodeCookie),
 2493: 
 2494:     %% Use -hidden nodes to avoid global connecting all nodes
 2495: 
 2496:     %% Start node A with different cookie
 2497:     %% and cookie configuration of mother node
 2498:     NodeAName = BaseName++"_nodeA",
 2499:     NodeA = full_node_name(NodeAName),
 2500:     NodeACookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2501:     NodeACookie = list_to_atom(NodeACookieL),
 2502:     { ok, NodeA } =
 2503:         start_node(
 2504:           "-hidden", NodeAName,
 2505:           "-setcookie "++NodeL++" "++NodeCookieL ),
 2506: 
 2507:     try
 2508: 
 2509:         %% Verify the cluster
 2510:         [ NodeA ] = nodes(hidden),
 2511:         [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2512:         NodeCookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2513: 
 2514:         true = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, set_cookie, [NodeACookie] ),
 2515: 
 2516:         %% Start node B with different cookie
 2517:         %% and cookie configuration of mother node and node A
 2518:         NodeBName = BaseName++"_nodeB",
 2519:         NodeB = full_node_name(NodeBName),
 2520:         NodeBCookieL = BaseName++"_cookieB",
 2521:         NodeBCookie = list_to_atom(NodeBCookieL),
 2522:         { ok, NodeB } =
 2523:             start_node(
 2524:               "-hidden", NodeBName,
 2525:               "-setcookie "++NodeBCookieL++" "
 2526:               "-setcookie "++NodeL++" "++NodeCookieL++" "
 2527:               "-setcookie "++atom_to_list(NodeA)++" "++NodeACookieL ),
 2528: 
 2529:         try
 2530: 
 2531:             %% Verify the cluster
 2532:             NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2533:             NodeBCookie = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2534:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2535:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2536:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2537: 
 2538:             %% Connect the nodes
 2539:             pong = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2540: 
 2541:             %% Verify the cluster
 2542:             NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2543:             NodeBCookie = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2544:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2545:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeB],
 2546:                         rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2547:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeA],
 2548:                         rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ))
 2549: 
 2550:         after
 2551:             _ = stop_node(NodeB)
 2552:         end
 2553:     after
 2554:         _ = stop_node(NodeA)
 2555:     end,
 2556:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2557:     ok.
 2558: 
 2559: connection_cookie(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2560:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2561:     Node = node(),
 2562:     true = Node =/= nonode@nohost,
 2563:     [] = nodes(),
 2564:     NodeL = atom_to_list(Node),
 2565:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2566: 
 2567:     %% Start node A with dedicated connection cookie
 2568:     NodeAName = BaseName++"_nodeA",
 2569:     NodeA = full_node_name(NodeAName),
 2570:     NodeACookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2571:     NodeACookie = list_to_atom(NodeACookieL),
 2572:     true = NodeACookie =/= erlang:get_cookie(),
 2573:     ConnectionCookieL = BaseName++"_connectionCookie",
 2574:     ConnectionCookie = list_to_atom(ConnectionCookieL),
 2575:     true = erlang:set_cookie( NodeA, ConnectionCookie ),
 2576:     { ok, NodeA } =
 2577:         start_node(
 2578:           "", NodeAName,
 2579:           "-setcookie "++NodeACookieL++" "
 2580:           "-setcookie "++NodeL++" "++ConnectionCookieL ),
 2581: 
 2582:     try
 2583: 
 2584:         %% Verify the cluster
 2585:         [ NodeA ] = nodes(),
 2586:         [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [] ),
 2587:         NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2588:         ConnectionCookie = rpc:call( NodeA, auth, get_cookie, [Node]),
 2589:         ConnectionCookie = erlang:get_cookie( NodeA )
 2590: 
 2591:     after
 2592:         _ = stop_node(NodeA)
 2593:     end,
 2594:     [] = nodes(),
 2595:     ok.
 2596: 
 2597: dyn_differing_cookies(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2598:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2599:     MotherNode = node(),
 2600:     true = MotherNode =/= nonode@nohost,
 2601:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2602:     MotherNodeL = atom_to_list(MotherNode),
 2603:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2604:     MotherNodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie(),
 2605:     MotherNodeCookieL = atom_to_list(MotherNodeCookie),
 2606:     register(?FUNCTION_NAME, self()),
 2607: 
 2608:     %% Start node A with different cookie
 2609:     %% and cookie configuration of mother node
 2610:     DynNodeCookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2611:     DynNodeCookie = list_to_atom(DynNodeCookieL),
 2612:     {_NF1, Port1} =
 2613:         start_node_unconnected(
 2614:           "-setcookie "++MotherNodeL++" "++MotherNodeCookieL,
 2615:           undefined, DynNodeCookie,
 2616:           ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
 2617:           ["ddc_remote_run", MotherNodeL, "cmdline", MotherNodeCookieL] ),
 2618: 
 2619:     dyn_differing_cookies(MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, Port1),
 2620: 
 2621:     %% Same again, but use erlang:set_cookie/2 to set MotherNodeCookie
 2622:     {_NF2, Port2} =
 2623:         start_node_unconnected(
 2624:           "",
 2625:           undefined, DynNodeCookie,
 2626:           ?MODULE, run_remote_test,
 2627:           ["ddc_remote_run", MotherNodeL, "set_cookie", MotherNodeCookieL] ),
 2628: 
 2629:     dyn_differing_cookies(MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, Port2).
 2630: 
 2631: 
 2632: dyn_differing_cookies(MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, Port) ->
 2633:     receive
 2634:         { MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, DynNode } ->
 2635:             [ DynNode ] = nodes(hidden),
 2636:             [ MotherNode ] = rpc:call( DynNode, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2637:             DynNodeCookie = rpc:call( DynNode, erlang, get_cookie, [] ),
 2638:             MotherNodeCookie =
 2639:                 rpc:call( DynNode, erlang, get_cookie, [MotherNode] ),
 2640:             {ddc_remote_run, DynNode} !
 2641:                 {MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNode},
 2642: 
 2643:             0 = wait_for_port_exit(Port),
 2644: 
 2645:             [] = nodes(hidden),
 2646:             ok;
 2647:         {Port, {data, Data}} ->
 2648:             io:format("~p: ~s", [Port, Data]),
 2649:             dyn_differing_cookies(
 2650:               MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, Port);
 2651:         Other ->
 2652:             error({unexpected, Other})
 2653:     end.
 2654: 
 2655: ddc_remote_run(MotherNode, [SetCookie, MotherNodeCookieL]) ->
 2656:     nonode@nohost = node(),
 2657:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2658:     MotherNodeCookie = list_to_atom(MotherNodeCookieL),
 2659:     case SetCookie of
 2660:         "set_cookie" ->
 2661:             erlang:set_cookie(MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie);
 2662:         "cmdline" ->
 2663:             ok
 2664:     end,
 2665:     MotherNodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie(MotherNode),
 2666:     true = net_kernel:connect_node( MotherNode ),
 2667:     [ MotherNode ] = nodes(hidden),
 2668:     DynNode = node(),
 2669:     [ DynNode ] = rpc:call( MotherNode, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2670:     MotherNodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie( MotherNode ),
 2671:     MotherNodeCookie = rpc:call( MotherNode, erlang, get_cookie, [] ),
 2672:     %% Here we get the mother node's default cookie
 2673:     MotherNodeCookie = rpc:call( MotherNode, erlang, get_cookie, [DynNode] ),
 2674:     DynNodeCookie = erlang:get_cookie(),
 2675:     register(ddc_remote_run, self() ),
 2676:     {dyn_differing_cookies, MotherNode} !
 2677:         {MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNodeCookie, DynNode},
 2678:     receive
 2679:         { MotherNode, MotherNodeCookie, DynNode } ->
 2680:             true = disconnect_node( MotherNode ),
 2681:             [] = nodes(hidden),
 2682:             ok;
 2683:         Other ->
 2684:             error({unexpected, Other})
 2685:     end.
 2686: 
 2687: xdg_cookie(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2688:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2689: 
 2690:     TestHome = filename:join(PrivDir, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2691:     ok = file:make_dir(TestHome),
 2692: 
 2693:     HomeEnv = case os:type() of
 2694:               {win32, _} ->
 2695:                   [Drive | Path] = filename:split(TestHome),
 2696:                   [{"APPDATA", filename:join(TestHome,"AppData")},
 2697:                    {"HOMEDRIVE", Drive}, {"HOMEPATH", filename:join(Path)}];
 2698:               _ ->
 2699:                   [{"HOME", TestHome}]
 2700:           end,
 2701: 
 2702:     NodeOpts = #{ env => HomeEnv ++
 2703:                       [{"ERL_CRASH_DUMP", filename:join([TestHome,"erl_crash.dump"])}],
 2704:                   connection => 0 },
 2705: 
 2706:     %% Test that a default .erlang.cookie file is created
 2707:     {ok, CreatorPeer, _} = peer:start_link(NodeOpts#{ name => peer:random_name(?FUNCTION_NAME) }),
 2708:     UserConfig = peer:call(CreatorPeer, filename, basedir, [user_config,"erlang"]),
 2709:     ?assert(peer:call(CreatorPeer, filelib, is_regular,
 2710:                       [filename:join(TestHome, ".erlang.cookie")])),
 2711:     OrigCookie = peer:call(CreatorPeer, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2712:     peer:stop(CreatorPeer),
 2713: 
 2714:     %% Test that the $HOME/.erlang.cookie file takes precedence over XDG
 2715:     XDGCookie = filename:join([UserConfig, ".erlang.cookie"]),
 2716:     ok = filelib:ensure_dir(XDGCookie),
 2717:     ok = file:write_file(XDGCookie, "Me want cookie!"),
 2718:     {ok, XDGFI} = file:read_file_info(XDGCookie),
 2719:     ok = file:write_file_info(XDGCookie, XDGFI#file_info{ mode = 8#600 }),
 2720: 
 2721:     {ok, Peer, _} = peer:start_link(NodeOpts#{ name => peer:random_name(?FUNCTION_NAME) }),
 2722: 
 2723:     ?assertEqual(OrigCookie, peer:call(Peer, erlang, get_cookie, [])),
 2724: 
 2725:     peer:stop(Peer),
 2726: 
 2727:     %% Check that XDG cookie works after we delete the $HOME cookie
 2728:     HomeCookie = filename:join(TestHome, ".erlang.cookie"),
 2729:     {ok, HomeFI} = file:read_file_info(HomeCookie),
 2730:     ok = file:write_file_info(HomeCookie, HomeFI#file_info{ mode = 8#777 }),
 2731:     ok = file:delete(HomeCookie),
 2732:     {ok, Peer2, _} = peer:start_link(NodeOpts#{ name => peer:random_name(?FUNCTION_NAME) }),
 2733:     ?assertEqual('Me want cookie!', peer:call(Peer2, erlang, get_cookie, [])),
 2734: 
 2735:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 2736: 
 2737:     ok.
 2738: 
 2739: allowed(_Config) ->
 2740:     %% inspired by differing_cookies/1
 2741:     test_server:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 2742:     Node = node(),
 2743:     true = Node =/= nonode@nohost,
 2744:     [] = nodes(),
 2745:     BaseName = atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 2746: 
 2747:     %% Use -hidden nodes to avoid global connecting all nodes
 2748: 
 2749:     %% Start node A with different cookie
 2750:     NodeAName = BaseName++"_nodeA",
 2751:     NodeA = full_node_name(NodeAName),
 2752:     NodeACookieL = BaseName++"_cookieA",
 2753:     NodeACookie = list_to_atom(NodeACookieL),
 2754:     true = erlang:set_cookie( NodeA, NodeACookie ),
 2755:     { ok, NodeA } =
 2756:         start_node( "-hidden", NodeAName, "-setcookie "++NodeACookieL ),
 2757:    
 2758:     %% allow Node on NodeA so that other connections are dismissed
 2759:     {ok,[]} = rpc:call(NodeA, net_kernel, allowed, []),
 2760:     ok = rpc:call(NodeA, net_kernel, allow, [[Node]]),
 2761:     {ok,[Node]} = rpc:call(NodeA, net_kernel, allowed, []),
 2762:     try
 2763: 
 2764:         %% Verify the cluster
 2765:         [ NodeA ] = nodes(hidden),
 2766:         [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2767: 
 2768:         %% Start node B with another different cookie
 2769:         NodeBName = BaseName++"_nodeB",
 2770:         NodeB = full_node_name(NodeBName),
 2771:         NodeBCookieL = BaseName++"_cookieB",
 2772:         NodeBCookie = list_to_atom(NodeBCookieL),
 2773:         true = erlang:set_cookie( NodeB, NodeBCookie ),
 2774:         { ok, NodeB } =
 2775:             start_node( "-hidden", NodeBName, "-setcookie "++NodeBCookieL ),
 2776: 
 2777:         try
 2778: 
 2779:             %% Verify the cluster
 2780:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2781:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2782:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2783: 
 2784:             %% Verify that the nodes can not connect
 2785:             %% before correcting the cookie configuration
 2786:             pang = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2787:             pang = rpc:call( NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA] ),
 2788: 
 2789:             %% Configure cookie and connect node A -> B
 2790:             true = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, set_cookie, [NodeB, NodeBCookie] ),
 2791:             %% Verify that the nodes can not connect
 2792:             %% even though they have the same cookie
 2793:             pang = rpc:call( NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB] ),
 2794:             pang = rpc:call( NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA] ),
 2795: 
 2796:             %% Allow node B on node A
 2797:             ok = rpc:call(NodeA, net_kernel, allow, [[NodeB]]),
 2798:             {ok,[Node,NodeB]} = rpc:call(NodeA, net_kernel, allowed, []),
 2799:             pong = rpc:call(NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB]),
 2800:             pong = rpc:call(NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA]),
 2801: 
 2802:             %% Verify that A can connect to B
 2803:             %% even though they have different cookies
 2804:             true = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, set_cookie, [NodeB, NodeACookie] ),
 2805:             pong = rpc:call(NodeA, net_adm, ping, [NodeB]),
 2806:             pong = rpc:call(NodeB, net_adm, ping, [NodeA]),
 2807: 
 2808:             %% Verify the cluster
 2809:             NodeACookie = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2810:             NodeBCookie = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, get_cookie, []),
 2811:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2812:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeB],
 2813:                         rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2814:             equal_sets( [Node, NodeA],
 2815:                         rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] )),
 2816: 
 2817:             %% Disconnect node A from B
 2818:             true = rpc:call( NodeB, net_kernel, disconnect, [NodeA] ),
 2819: 
 2820:             %% Verify the cluster
 2821:             equal_sets( [NodeA, NodeB], nodes(hidden) ),
 2822:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeA, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2823:             [ Node ] = rpc:call( NodeB, erlang, nodes, [hidden] ),
 2824: 
 2825:             %% Test non-registered process
 2826:             %% 'net_kernel' is registered to a process
 2827:             %% so we unregister it to test the output 'ignored'
 2828:             ok = rpc:call(NodeA, erts_internal, dynamic_node_name, [false]),
 2829:             true = rpc:call(NodeA, erlang, unregister, [net_kernel]),
 2830:             ignored = rpc:call(NodeA, net_kernel, allow, [[NodeB]])
 2831:         after
 2832:             _ = stop_node(NodeB)
 2833:         end
 2834:     after
 2835:         _ = stop_node(NodeA)
 2836:     end,
 2837:     [] = nodes(hidden),
 2838:     ok.
 2839: 
 2840: %% Misc. functions
 2841: 
 2842: equal_sets(A, B) ->
 2843:     S = lists:sort(A),
 2844:     case lists:sort(B) of
 2845:         S ->
 2846:             ok;
 2847:         _ ->
 2848:             erlang:error({not_equal_sets, A, B})
 2849:     end.
 2850: 
 2851: run_dist_configs(Func, Config) ->
 2852:     GetOptProlog = "-proto_dist gen_tcp -gen_tcp_dist_output_loop "
 2853:         ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE) ++ " ",
 2854:     GenTcpDistTest = case get_gen_tcp_dist_test_type() of
 2855:                          default ->
 2856:                              {"gen_tcp_dist", "-proto_dist gen_tcp"};
 2857:                          size ->
 2858:                              {"gen_tcp_dist (get_size)",
 2859:                               GetOptProlog ++ "dist_cntrlr_output_test_size"}
 2860:                      end,
 2861:     lists:map(fun ({DCfgName, DCfg}) ->
 2862:                       io:format("~n~n=== Running ~s configuration ===~n~n",
 2863:                                 [DCfgName]),
 2864:                       Func(DCfg, Config)
 2865:               end,
 2866:               [{"default", ""}, GenTcpDistTest]).
 2867: 
 2868: start_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server() ->
 2869:     Me = self(),
 2870:     Go = make_ref(),
 2871:     io:format("STARTING: gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server~n",[]),
 2872:     {P, M} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 2873:                                    register(gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server, self()),
 2874:                                    Me ! Go,
 2875:                                    gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server()
 2876:                            end),
 2877:     receive
 2878:         Go ->
 2879:             ok;
 2880:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, _} ->
 2881:             start_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server()
 2882:     end.
 2883: 
 2884: kill_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server() ->
 2885:     case whereis(gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server) of
 2886:         undefined ->
 2887:             ok;
 2888:         Pid ->
 2889:             exit(Pid,kill),
 2890:             %% Sync death, before continuing...
 2891:             false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid)
 2892:     end.
 2893: 
 2894: gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server() ->
 2895:     Type = case abs(erlang:monotonic_time(second)) rem 2 of
 2896:                0 -> default;
 2897:                1 -> size
 2898:            end,
 2899:     gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(Type).
 2900: 
 2901: gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(Type) ->
 2902:     receive
 2903:         {From, Ref} ->
 2904:             From ! {Ref, Type},
 2905:             NewType = case Type of
 2906:                           default -> size;
 2907:                           size -> default
 2908:                       end,
 2909:             gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(NewType)
 2910:     end.
 2911: 
 2912: get_gen_tcp_dist_test_type() ->
 2913:     Ref = make_ref(),
 2914:     try
 2915:         gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server ! {self(), Ref},
 2916:         receive
 2917:             {Ref, Type} ->
 2918:                 Type
 2919:         end
 2920:     catch
 2921:         error:badarg ->
 2922:             start_gen_tcp_dist_test_type_server(),
 2923:             get_gen_tcp_dist_test_type()
 2924:     end.
 2925: 
 2926: dist_cntrlr_output_test_size(DHandle, Socket) ->
 2927:     false = erlang:dist_ctrl_get_opt(DHandle, get_size),
 2928:     false = erlang:dist_ctrl_set_opt(DHandle, get_size, true),
 2929:     true = erlang:dist_ctrl_get_opt(DHandle, get_size),
 2930:     true = erlang:dist_ctrl_set_opt(DHandle, get_size, false),
 2931:     false = erlang:dist_ctrl_get_opt(DHandle, get_size),
 2932:     false = erlang:dist_ctrl_set_opt(DHandle, get_size, true),
 2933:     true = erlang:dist_ctrl_get_opt(DHandle, get_size),
 2934:     dist_cntrlr_output_loop_size(DHandle, Socket).
 2935: 
 2936: dist_cntrlr_output_loop_size(DHandle, Socket) ->
 2937:     receive
 2938:         dist_data ->
 2939:             %% Outgoing data from this node...
 2940:             dist_cntrlr_send_data_size(DHandle, Socket);
 2941:         _ ->
 2942:             ok %% Drop garbage message...
 2943:     end,
 2944:     dist_cntrlr_output_loop_size(DHandle, Socket).
 2945: 
 2946: dist_cntrlr_send_data_size(DHandle, Socket) ->
 2947:     case erlang:dist_ctrl_get_data(DHandle) of
 2948:         none ->
 2949:             erlang:dist_ctrl_get_data_notification(DHandle);
 2950:         {Size, Data} ->
 2951:             ok = ensure_iovec(Data),
 2952:             Size = erlang:iolist_size(Data),
 2953:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Socket, Data),
 2954:             dist_cntrlr_send_data_size(DHandle, Socket)
 2955:     end.
 2956: 
 2957: ensure_iovec([]) ->
 2958:     ok;
 2959: ensure_iovec([X|Y]) when is_binary(X) ->
 2960:     ensure_iovec(Y).
 2961: 
 2962: monitor_node_state() ->
 2963:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 2964:     MonitoringNodes = erts_debug:get_internal_state(monitoring_nodes),
 2965:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false),
 2966:     MonitoringNodes.
 2967: 
 2968: 
 2969: check_no_nodedown_nodeup(TimeOut) ->
 2970:     receive
 2971: 	{nodeup, _, _} = Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_nodeup, Msg});
 2972: 	{nodeup, _} = Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_nodeup, Msg});
 2973: 	{nodedown, _, _} = Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_nodedown, Msg});
 2974: 	{nodedown, _} = Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_nodedown, Msg})
 2975:     after TimeOut ->
 2976: 	    ok
 2977:     end.
 2978: 
 2979: print_my_messages() ->
 2980:     {messages, Messages} = process_info(self(), messages),
 2981:     io:format("Messages: ~p~n", [Messages]),
 2982:     ok.
 2983: 
 2984: 
 2985: sleep(T) -> receive after T * 1000 -> ok end.	
 2986: 
 2987: start_node(_DCfg, Name, Param, this) ->
 2988:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 2989:     test_server:start_node(Name, peer, [{args, NewParam}, {erl, [this]}]);
 2990: start_node(DCfg, Name, Param, "this") ->
 2991:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ " " ++ DCfg,
 2992:     test_server:start_node(Name, peer, [{args, NewParam}, {erl, [this]}]);
 2993: start_node(DCfg, Name, Param, Rel) when is_atom(Rel) ->
 2994:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ " " ++ DCfg,
 2995:     test_server:start_node(Name, peer, [{args, NewParam}, {erl, [{release, atom_to_list(Rel)}]}]);
 2996: start_node(DCfg, Name, Param, Rel) when is_list(Rel) ->
 2997:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ " " ++ DCfg,
 2998:     test_server:start_node(Name, peer, [{args, NewParam}, {erl, [{release, Rel}]}]).
 2999: 
 3000: start_node(DCfg, Name, Param) ->
 3001:     NewParam = Param ++ " -pa " ++ filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ " " ++ DCfg,
 3002:     test_server:start_node(Name, slave, [{args, NewParam}]).
 3003: 
 3004: start_node(DCfg, Name) ->
 3005:     start_node(DCfg, Name, "").
 3006: 
 3007: stop_node(Node) ->
 3008:     test_server:stop_node(Node).
 3009: 
 3010: get_nodenames(N, T) ->
 3011:     get_nodenames(N, T, []).
 3012: 
 3013: get_nodenames(0, _, Acc) ->
 3014:     Acc;
 3015: get_nodenames(N, T, Acc) ->
 3016:     U = erlang:unique_integer([positive]),
 3017:     get_nodenames(N-1, T, [list_to_atom(atom_to_list(T)
 3018: 					++ "-"
 3019: 					++ ?MODULE_STRING
 3020: 					++ "-"
 3021: 					++ integer_to_list(U)) | Acc]).
 3022: 
 3023: get_numbered_nodenames(N, T) ->
 3024:     get_numbered_nodenames(N, T, []).
 3025: 
 3026: get_numbered_nodenames(0, _, Acc) ->
 3027:     Acc;
 3028: get_numbered_nodenames(N, T, Acc) ->
 3029:     U = erlang:unique_integer([positive]),
 3030:     NL = [list_to_atom(atom_to_list(T) ++ integer_to_list(N)
 3031: 		       ++ "-"
 3032: 		       ++ ?MODULE_STRING
 3033: 		       ++ "-"
 3034: 		       ++ integer_to_list(U)) | Acc],
 3035:     get_numbered_nodenames(N-1, T, NL).
 3036: 
 3037: wait_until(Fun) ->
 3038:     case Fun() of
 3039: 	true ->
 3040: 	    ok;
 3041: 	_ ->
 3042: 	    receive
 3043: 	    after 100 ->
 3044: 		    wait_until(Fun)
 3045: 	    end
 3046:     end.
 3047: 
 3048: repeat(Fun, 0) when is_function(Fun) ->
 3049:     ok;
 3050: repeat(Fun, N) when is_function(Fun), is_integer(N), N > 0 ->
 3051:     Fun(),
 3052:     repeat(Fun, N-1).
 3053: 
 3054: no_msgs(Wait) ->
 3055:     receive after Wait -> no_msgs() end.
 3056: 
 3057: no_msgs() ->
 3058:     {messages, []} = process_info(self(), messages).
 3059: 
 3060: block_emu(Ms) ->
 3061:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 3062:     Res = erts_debug:set_internal_state(block, Ms),
 3063:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false),
 3064:     Res.
 3065: 
 3066:
